thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Lostu70

author: Lostu70
title: Lostu70
text: Hi the buying experience with banggood is very pleasant. Price are good. Shipping not very fast, but at low price. Packing normally very good. The customer service is very kind rapid and efficient. Sometime I had some problem in receiving item, but they promptly refunded me or resend it to me. What more to ask? If they keep on going like this Banggood will continue to be number one for me.
